sorcery.name: Great Soul Arrow
sorcery.description: Fires a more powerful soul arrow.

sorcery.name: Heavy Soul Arrow
sorcery.description: Fires a heavy soul arrow
sorcery.acquired: Starting spell for the Sorcery Class

sorcery.name: Great Heavy Soul Arrow
sorcery.description: Fires a more powerful heavy soul arrow.

sorcery.name: Farron Dart
sorcery.description: Fires a soul dart.

sorcery.name: Great Farron Dart
sorcery.description: Fires a more powerful soul dart.

sorcery.name: Farron Hail
sorcery.description: Fires a cascade of soul darts.

sorcery.name: Homing Soulmass
sorcery.description: Releases a homing soulmass.

sorcery.name: Crystal Homing Soulmass
sorcery.description: Releases a homing crystal soulmass. Crystal soulmass has piercing qualities.

sorcery.name: Crystal Hail
sorcery.description: Casts a cascade of small crystal soulmasses from above. Crystal soumlasses have piercing qualities.

sorcery.name: Soul Spear
sorcery.description: Fires a soul spear.

sorcery.name: Crystal Soul Spear
sorcery.description: Fires a piercing crystal soul spear.

sorcery.name: White Dragon Breath
sorcery.description: Emits a crystal breath of Seath the Scaleless. Crystal breath has piercing qualities.

sorcery.name: Soul Stream
sorcery.description: Ka-me HA-me HAAAA!

sorcery.name: Soul Greatsword
sorcery.description: Attacks with a greatsword fromed from souls.

sorcery.name: Farron Flashsword
sorcery.description: Alteration of Soul Greatsword developed by sorcerers of the Undead Legion of Farron.

sorcery.name: Magic Weapon
sorcery.description: Reinforce right weapon with magic.

sorcery.name: Great Magic Weapon
sorcery.description: Greatly reinforces right weapon with magic.

sorcery.name: Crystal Magic Weapon
sorcery.description: Reinforce right weapon with crystal.

sorcery.name: Magic Shield
sorcery.description: Reinforce left shield with magic.

sorcery.name: Great Magic Shield
sorcery.description: Greatly reinforces left shield with magic.

sorcery.name: Spook
sorcery.description: Masks noises of the caster and prevents fall damage.

sorcery.name: Aural Decoy
sorcery.description: Distract foes with distant sound.

sorcery.name: Pestilent Mist
sorcery.description: Releases dense mist that eats away at HP. Beware, as the caster is not immune to its effect.

sorcery.name: Cast Light
sorcery.description: Casts a light to illuminate surroundings.

sorcery.name: Repair
sorcery.description: Repairs equipped weapons and armour. Includes weapons with exhausted durability.

sorcery.name: Hidden Weapon
sorcery.description: Turns right weapon invisible.

sorcery.name: Hidden Body
sorcery.description: Turns body nearly invisible.

miracles.name: Heal Aid
miracles.description: Miracle imparted as charity to those of little faith. A show of tolerance from the Way of White. Slightly restores HP. To use miracles, equip a talisman or sacred chime and attune a miracle at a bonfire.

miracles.name: Heal
miracles.description: Elementary miracle cast by clerics. Restores HP for self and those in the vicinity. To use miracles, equip a talisman or sacred chime and attune a miracle at a bonfire.

pyromancy.name: FireBall
pyromancy.description: Elementary pyromancy that is often the first learned. Hurls a fireball. To use pyromancies, equip a pyromancy flame and attune a pyromancy at a bonfire.

pyromancy.name: Fire Orb
pyromancy.description: The signature flame-manipulating spell common to pyromancers. Hurls a giant fire orb. The blazing fire orb explodes on impact, dealing fire damage to the surrounding area. They say that once a pyromancer learns this spell, their understanding of the flame deepens, together with a yearning for it.
